short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save personal notes for each Twitter profile directly on the page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Twitter Notes is a handy Chrome extension that allows you to save personal notes for each Twitter user directly on their profile page. With this extension, you can easily store and access your thoughts, observations, or reminders about a particular Twitter user without leaving the platform.

Features:

* Save personal notes for each Twitter profile.
* Notes are stored and synced using Chrome storage, so you can access them from any device with the extension installed.
* Intuitive user interface makes it easy to create, edit, and save notes.


How to use:

Install the Twitter Notes extension from the Chrome Web Store.
1) Visit a Twitter profile page.
2) Click the extension icon in the toolbar to open the popup.
3) If the page is a valid Twitter profile, you will see the user's handle displayed.
4) Type your note in the text area and click "Save".
5) The note will be saved and displayed directly on the user's profile page

Please note that this extension is not affiliated with Twitter and is developed independently
